promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young simple cat dark-type pokemon wearing golden bracers. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or cat. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Giltombra, a a chibi young simple cat dark-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: Air Crash, Shadow Sneak. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "cat", "dark" or "Giltombra". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, cat-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pink bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: This petite feline lurks in crypts, playfully pouncing on shadows. It employs Air Crash to levitate objects and Shadow Sneak to swiftly blend in.
